alert.note: Alert for Mahoning; Portage; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 22 at 12:29AM EDT until September 22 at 1:15AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Portage County in northeastern Ohio... Southern Trumbull County in northeastern Ohio... Northern Mahoning County in northeastern Ohio... * Until 115 AM EDT. * At 1229 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ravenna, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Youngstown, Warren, Ravenna, Boardman, Niles, Campbell, Hubbard, Canfield, Newton Falls, Lordstown, Garrettsville, Vienna Center, Hilltop, Maplewood Park, Leavittsburg, Austintown, Struthers, Girard, Vienna and McDonald. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
